title: Store Deputy Trainee Manager 候任店舖見習經理
description:
PARKnSHOP Supermarket is part of AS Watson Group, the world’s largest international health and beauty retailer operating over 17,000 stores across 12 retail brands in 31 markets, with 130,000 people globally.
  
  

In the fiscal year 2024, AS Watson Group reported revenue of over US$24 billion. The company's technology\-enabled O\+O (Offline plus Online) platforms serve over 6 billion shoppers annually, seamlessly integrating physical and digital retail experiences.
  
  

Founded in 1972, PARKnSHOP, under the AS Watson Group is the largest offline and online (O\+O) supermarket chain in Hong Kong and one of the most trusted brands among local consumers. With over 240 stores across Hong Kong and Macau, PARKnSHOP operates several well\-known retail brands, including FUSION, TASTE, TASTE x FRESH, FOOD PARC, and GREAT FOOD HALL.
  
  

As Hong Kong’s most forward\-thinking food and lifestyle supermarket, PARKnSHOP fully embodies its brand promise—"BEST , EASY, VALUE." The company continuously develops innovative, exclusive products to provide a diverse range of high\-quality goods and a convenient shopping experience. It prioritizes freshness, safety, and hygiene while introducing creative store concepts and engaging promotions to cater to various customer needs.
  
  

Additionally, PARKnSHOP leads the industry in promoting sustainability, embedding eco\-conscious practices into store design and daily operations while encouraging customers to support environmental initiatives and give back to the community.
  
  

PARKnSHOP continues to evolve alongside market trends. In 2007, it pioneered the "MoneyBack" loyalty program and, in recent years, has enhanced the O\+O shopping experience with the introduction of PNS online shopping platforms (PNS.hk and the PNS mobile app). Renowned for its visionary retail strategies, PARKnSHOP has garnered widespread recognition and numerous industry awards, solidifying its leadership in the sector.
  
  

Job Description
  
  

**Programme Highlights:**  

Attend a 6\-month professional training programme
  
  

Acquire “Certificate in Retail Store Specialist \- Supermarket Chain (QF Level 3\) " after successful completion of the programme
  
  

接受6個月專業培訓課程
  
  

成功修畢課程後可獲取資歷認可證書 \-「零售店舖專才證書–超級市場連鎖店 (資歷架構第3級)」
  
  

**About the job:**  

Develop Store operations knowledge and management competency through a 6\-month training programme
  
  

Promote to Store Trainee Manager after successful completion of the programme and take the “Advanced Diploma in Retail Store Management – Supermarket Chain (QF Level 4\)", a recognised qualification equivalent to Associate Degree level under the Qualification Framework
  
  

透過6個月的培訓課程,加強學員對店舖各部門的營運及管理知識
  
  

學員成功修畢課程後可晉升為見習店舖經理,並修讀「零售管理高等文憑–超級市場連鎖店 (資歷架構第4級)」,此課程資歷獲教育局認可並相等於副學士級別,開展店舖管理的事業
  
  

What we look for?
  
  

Secondary graduates with 1 year's retail or service industry work experience; preferably gained in food or supermarket industry
  
  

Basic knowledge in MS Office applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
  
  

A good team player with excellent customer service skill
  
  

Proactive and result oriented, with the ability to take up challenges in a fast\-paced and dynamic retail business environment
  
  

具1年零售或服務行業經驗的中學畢業生(曾從事食品或超級市場管理行業優先考慮)
  
  

懂基本電腦操作如Word、Excel、PowerPoint軟件
  
  

具備良好顧客服務態度及團隊合作精神
  
  

性格主動積極,勇於接受挑戰
  
  

Don’t miss the chance to join our winning team!
  
  

Interested parties please forward your resume with current and expected salary package to our Company’s email. To be one of US, you can enjoy:
  
  

Comprehensive Medical and Life insurance coverage, including your spouse and children
  
  

Exclusive company pension schemes
  
  

Marriage, Maternity and Paternity Leave
  
  

Exclusive shopping discount, Bazaar Sales for our people only
  
  

Professional training and career advancement opportunities
  
  

For enquiries, please contact Recruitment Hotline 3697 7629 or WhatsApp 9707 7261\.
  
  

**有興趣申請者,請電郵您的履歷,並註明現時及期望待遇予至公司電郵地址。成為我們的一份子,您可享:**  

全面醫療及人壽保險保障 (包括配偶及子女)
  
  

免供款公積金計劃
  
  

婚假、產假及侍產假
  
  

員工專享購物折扣優惠
  
  

良好培訓及晉升機會
  
  

如有任何疑問,歡迎致電招募熱線 3697 7629 或WhatsApp 9707 7261 。
  
  

We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all qualified candidates. The information provided will be treated in strict confidence and be used only for consideration of your application for relevant / similar posts within the AS Watson Group. All personal data of unsuccessful applicants will be destroyed within 12 months from the date of application.
  
  

我們乃平等機會僱主,歡迎所有合資格人申請。所有資料將會絕對保密,並只用作考慮屈臣氏集團有關或類似職位之申請。未獲取錄之申請者的所有個人資料將於十二個月內予以銷毀。

description:
PARKnSHOP Supermarket is part of AS Watson Group, the world’s largest international health and beauty retailer operating over 17,000 stores across 12 retail brands in 31 markets, with 130,000 people globally.
  
  

In the fiscal year 2024, AS Watson Group reported revenue of over US$24 billion. The company's technology\-enabled O\+O (Offline plus Online) platforms serve over 6 billion shoppers annually, seamlessly integrating physical and digital retail experiences.
  
  

Founded in 1972, PARKnSHOP, under the AS Watson Group is the largest offline and online (O\+O) supermarket chain in Hong Kong and one of the most trusted brands among local consumers. With over 240 stores across Hong Kong and Macau, PARKnSHOP operates several well\-known retail brands, including FUSION, TASTE, TASTE x FRESH, FOOD PARC, and GREAT FOOD HALL.
  
  

As Hong Kong’s most forward\-thinking food and lifestyle supermarket, PARKnSHOP fully embodies its brand promise—"BEST , EASY, VALUE." The company continuously develops innovative, exclusive products to provide a diverse range of high\-quality goods and a convenient shopping experience. It prioritizes freshness, safety, and hygiene while introducing creative store concepts and engaging promotions to cater to various customer needs.
  
  

Additionally, PARKnSHOP leads the industry in promoting sustainability, embedding eco\-conscious practices into store design and daily operations while encouraging customers to support environmental initiatives and give back to the community.

Passion for long\-term career development in food retail industry

title: Analytics Technician Trainee (MNC, fresh graduate welcome)
description:
Due to our rapid business growth and expansion, we are now looking passionate talented to work at the world’s most respected gemological laboratory as an ***Analytics Technician Trainee*** in our GIA Hong Kong Laboratory located in Kowloon Bay.

**ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES**

* Operate advanced and standard gemological instruments.
* Collect and supply valid, high quality data in accordance with protocols or on occasions specific to guidance given by gemologist.
* Evaluate the results and know when to continue with analysis or move on to other jobs.
* Maintain instruments to ensure reliability in accordance with manufacturers and department instructions to maintain a constant availability.
* Participates in special projects, data collection, instrument testing and document filing.
* Deal with colleagues effectively and professionally under pressure.

**TECHNICAL COMPETENCIES (Knowledge, Skills and Abilities)**

* Bachelor’s Degree in Scientific field (chemistry, physics, or geology preferred); or equivalent combination of training and /or experience.
* Receptive to constructive criticism and commitment to continuous refinement of job skills.
* Strong attention to detail and good concentration skills.
* Ability to get along and work as a team with a diverse group of individuals.
* Experience with spectroscopy, chemical analysis instruments, gemological instruments and/or statistical analysis is a plus.

“*We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applications from all qualified candidates. Personal data provided by job applicants will be used strictly in accordance with our personal data policy. The information will only be used for appointment to the Company and other company\-related purposes.”*

Please submit resumes via Apply Now. All resumes must include your past salary history and current salary requirements.

We encourage you to visit our corporate website at http://www.gia.edu/ to learn more information about GIA.

* Medical Insurance

title: Graduate Trainee Programme – Building Consultancy
description:
Knight Frank is the leading independent global property consultancy. Headquartered in London, Knight Frank has more than 20,000 people operating from over 487 offices across 53 territories.
  
  

Our Hong Kong business was established in 1972\. Since then, we have expanded to provide complete coverage across Greater China. We now operate offices in Hong Kong, Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Taipei and Macau. With over 50 years’ local experience, Knight Frank is one of the leading providers of property\-related services in Greater China.
  
  

Our purpose is to work responsibly in partnership, to enhance people’s lives and environments . We aspire to be a positive force in the property sector and the wider communities and environments in which we operate.
  
  

Knight Frank is a partnership defined by our people and the spirit of possibility. A true partnership is a balanced one, and we are both passionate about, and committed to, making our business inclusive and diverse; giving each and every individual the space and opportunity to perform at their best and be recognised for the immense value they bring.
  
  

In Hong Kong, we have received the HR Asia Awards Best Companies to Work For in Asia for 5 consecutive years and have been recognised as a Caring Company for 13 years in a row. We are also an equal opportunity employer.
  
  

Learn more about us at www.knightfrank.com.hk and follow us on social media.
  
  

LinkedIn \| Facebook \| Instagram
  
  

About the role
  
  

This is an exciting opportunity to join the 24\-month Graduate Trainee Programme in the Building Consultancy Department.
  
  

You will be part of the dynamic team responsible for offering comprehensive building surveying services from a property consultancy perspective. This full\-time position offers a structured training programme not only in building surveying but also in property management. You will gain theoretical learning and practical experience in the building surveying sector.
  
  

Responsibilities
  
  

Handle projects and develop proposals including interpreting client's brief and project objectives
  
  

Participate in fitting out, renovation, maintenance and repair projects
  
  

Conduct on\-site building inspections and condition surveys
  
  

Coordinate alterations and addition works including preparing specifications or licensing requirements
  
  

Assist in building plan submissions to the government departments
  
  

Conduct tendering exercises including analysis and award
  
  

Supervise project implementation including cost and quality control
  
  

Provide support in property management tasks including budgeting and financial reporting
  
  

Requirements
  
  

Degree holder in Building Surveying, Building Studies or equivalent
  
  

A proactive, positive and attentive to detail approach to work
  
  

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build relationships with clients and stakeholders
  
  

A keen interest in the property industry and a desire to develop a career in building consultancy
  
  

Proficient in MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Chinese word processing
  
  

Good spoken and written English, Cantonese and Mandarin
  
  

We will offer an attractive remuneration package to the right candidate. Interested parties please click Apply Now to submit your full résumé with available date, and current and expected salaries to the Human Resources Department.
  
  

To learn more about working at Knight Frank, please click here to view our corporate video.
  
  

You are encouraged to read our digital brochure “ Why Knight Frank ” to understand how we attract and inspire people to join our exceptional firm.
  
  

Knight Frank is an equal\-opportunity employer committed to fostering a diverse workforce and inclusive workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, colour, gender, religion, disability, sexual orientation, age, national or ethnic origin, or family status. If you require special assistance during the recruitment process, please email us via email \[email redacted, apply via Company website] at any time.

title: Terminal Planning Analyst II 二級碼頭規劃分析主任 (Fresh graduate also welcome)
description:
Modern Terminals’ success as a container terminal operator in Hong Kong and Mainland China has been built and sustained by consistently providing customer focused services, and delivering a unique customer experience that aligns with our Brand Promises. We achieve this through the commitment and involvement of all our people, and by aligning our operations and actions with our values of Trust, Accountability and Teamwork.
  
  

The Role
  
Reporting to Manager, Terminal Planning, the job holder's major responsibilities are to:
  
Participate in terminal development and upgrade project in Hong Kong and / or Mainland
  
Perform analysis and define the medium to long term terminal upgrade, improvement and expansion plan
  
Work with internal and external parties including consultants, government authorities and other stakeholders in differnet projects
  
Perform statistical analysis / modelling, cost\-benefit analysis and workflow analysis for preparing project proposals for equipment and infrastructure projects
  
  

The Person
  
  

**The ideal candidate should have / be:**  

Degree in Operation Research, Industrial Engineering, enterprise Engineering, Quantitative Analysis, Operations Management, Logistics Management, or related discipline
  
At least 2 years relevant experience in project planning, exection or related duties
  
Proficiency in written and spoken English and Chinese (including Putonghua)
  
Proficiency in quantitative analysis is preferred
  
Strong PC skills in Word, Excel and PowerPoint
  
Good team player, proactive, able to work independently
  
Good communication and documentation skills
  
Candidate with less experience will be considered as Terminal Planning Trainee
  
  

We offer competitive remuneration package to the right candidate(s). Please apply in confidence with full resume, present and expected salary and contact telephone number, by clicking Apply Now.

title: Healthcare Associate Trainee Program 2025
description:
關於屈臣氏
  
  

屈臣氏是亞洲最大的線下及線上(O\+O)保健及美容產品零售商,業務遍佈16個亞洲及歐洲市場,經營超過8,000家店舖,當中超過1,500家提供專業藥房服務。
  
  

屈臣氏在港澳擁有近180家分店,其中近60家設有駐店藥房。店舖的專業團隊由註冊藥劑師、營養師、中醫師、健康顧問、美妝顧問、母嬰健康顧問及護士所組成,為顧客提供無微不至的服務。
  
  

屈臣氏一直領導著保健及美容產品零售業,為顧客提供個人化的諮詢及建議,配以傲視同儕的多元化產品種類,令顧客每天都能LOOK GOOD, DO GOOD, FEEL GREAT。自2009年起,屈臣氏為亞洲第一個人護理店/藥房品牌\*。屈臣氏是屈臣氏集團旗下的保健及美容旗艦品牌,屈臣氏集團現為全球最大的國際保健美容零售商,在31個市場經營12個品牌合共超過17,000家商店,並在全球聘用超過13萬人。集團2024年財政年度的營業額超過240億美元,每年透過我們的O\+O平台服務超過55億名顧客,為他們帶來科技化的線下及線上購物體驗。詳情請瀏覽:www.aswatson.com。
  
  

* 《Campaign Asia\-Pacific》「亞洲一千最佳品牌」逾8,000名遍布14個亞太區市場受訪者網上市場調查結果


**香港屈臣氏網站:** http://www.watsons.com.hk
  
  

**香港屈臣氏Facebook:** https://www.facebook.com/watsonshongkong
  
  

**香港屈臣氏Instagram:** https://www.instagram.com/hkwatsons
  
  

Come and join a Winning Team
  
  

Be remarkable. Be yourself.
  
  

Why should you join us?
  
  

At Watsons Hong Kong , we believe in our people, teamwork and the importance of your personal growth. If you are seeking for an opportunity to join the leading O\+O health and beauty retailer in Asia with around 180 retail stores in Hong Kong and Macau, the Watsons Hong Kong family welcomes you!
  
  

**You can enjoy :**  

Comprehensive medical and life insurance coverage, including your spouse and children
  
  

Exclusive staff discounts for you and your spouse
  
  

**Role Purpose:**  

The position holder(s) will engage in 12\-month training program to become our professional Healthcare Consultant. Throughout the program, you will learn professional health knowledge and practical customer service and selling skills delivered by our specialists (including but not limited to Pharmacist, Dietitian and Nutritionist) in response to customer’s needs.
  
  

**A typical day in this Role:**  

Provide professional health advice to customers on Company’s comprehensive range of health and fitness products, and food supplements
  
  

Participate in company nutrition and health promotion activities and programs such as providing outreach consultancy services in community
  
  

Work closely with the Store Manager to ensure optimal team performance
  
  

**Success will depend on:**  

Tertiary Education and major in Nutrition, Health Science or related subjects
  
  

Fresh Graduate is welcome
  
  

Passionate in Health \& Beauty Industry
  
  

Customer\-oriented and be passionate about connecting with people
  
  

Good communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment
  
  

What is holding you back?
  
  

Grasp this opportunity and don't let this great chance to shape your life slip away!

title: Management Trainee Program - Cybersecurity Leader of Tomorrow
description:
About us
  
Edvance International Holdings (1410\.HK) is a Hong Kong\-founded leader in cybersecurity and technology with business across Asia. Recognized as the trusted partner for enterprises addressing cybersecurity challenges, we are dedicated to nurturing future leaders through our comprehensive Management Trainee Program. If you are a fresh graduate eager to develop your leadership skills and make an impact in the cybersecurity industry, we want to hear from you. Join us to grow your career with a market\-leading company committed to innovation and excellence.
  
  

Overview
  
Our Management Trainee Program is designed for recent graduates who are eager to develop their leadership skills in a dynamic environment. This program offers hands\-on experience across multiple departments, mentorship from industry leaders, and opportunities to tackle real business challenges.
  
  

What You'll Do
  
  

Participate in a program spanning different lines of business, gaining exposure to key business functions.
  
  

Collaborate on projects and initiatives with cross\-functional teams.
  
  

Work closely with senior management team, receiving guidance and insights into strategic decision\-making.
  
  

Complete a capstone project that addresses a real business challenge, culminating in a presentation to senior management.
  
  

Qualifications
  
  

Final year students or recent graduates with a Bachelor's Degree or above and less than 2 years of experience.
  
  

Degree in Information Technology / Computer Science / Engineering or equivalent.
  
  

Possess strong analytical and problem\-solving skills.
  
  

Demonstrate excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
  
  

Have a passion for learning and a drive to succeed in a leadership role.
  
  

Be proficient in spoken and written English, Cantonese, and Mandarin.
  
  

What We Offer
  
  

Competitive salary and benefits package.
  
  

Opportunities for career advancement within the company.
  
  

A supportive and inclusive work environment.
  
  

Networking opportunities with industry professionals.
  
  

All applications applied through our system will be delivered directly to the advertiser and privacy of personal data of the applicant will be ensured with security.

title: Project Manager/Site Agent/Site Engineers
Graduate Trainee, AI & SaaS (FormX.ai)
description:
**Kickstart your career in tech and AI! Join Oursky’s Graduate Trainee Program to learn, grow, and make real impact.**

FormX.ai is a flagship product of Oursky that uses cutting\-edge AI and large language models (LLMs) to help large companies automate and streamline their document workflows. We also build other forward\-thinking products like Authgear.com and SkyTest.ai.

We’re looking for enthusiastic **fresh graduates or early\-career talent** who want to grow their careers in **Business Development** within the fast\-paced world of AI and SaaS. You'll get mentorship, real sales experience, and exposure to global clients and cutting\-edge technology.

Learn more about us: https://jobs.oursky.com

\-\-\-\-\-\-

**What You’ll Learn and Do**

As part of our Graduate Trainee Program, you’ll be guided and trained by experienced mentors to:

* Explore and develop new client opportunities by reaching out to companies and introducing how FormX.ai and other Oursky products can help them.
* Understand the basics of AI, document automation, and how businesses apply these technologies.
* Collaborate with our Product and Marketing teams to create outreach strategies that really work.
* Attend meetings, demos, and client pitches to see first\-hand how deals are made.
* Use tools like CRM software and LinkedIn to manage leads and build client relationships.
* Hit achievable monthly and quarterly goals with the support of your team.

\-\-\-\-\-\-

**What We’re Looking For**

* **Fresh graduates or final\-year students** from any discipline are welcome.
* Passionate about **technology, AI, and startups** — you don’t need a technical background, but curiosity is a must!
* Strong communication and presentation skills in English. Cantonese is a big plus!
* Eager to grow, comfortable talking to people, and not afraid to take initiative.
* Self\-motivated, goal\-oriented, and enjoy working both independently and as part of a team.

\-\-\-\-\-\-

**What You’ll Get**

* **Structured mentorship and hands\-on training** to grow your sales and business development skills.
* **Flexible working hours and location**
* A chance to work with international clients and exposure to cutting\-edge AI.
* Good Base salary with an **uncapped commission** structure.
* Profit\-sharing plan for long\-term team members (2\+ years).
* Fun, supportive, and collaborative startup culture.

\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Apply at**

https://go.oursky.com/apply\-gt

Job Types: Full\-time, Permanent

Pay: $18,000\.00 \- $19,000\.00 per month

Benefits:

* Additional leave
* Dental insurance
* Flexible schedule
* Maternity leave
* Medical Insurance
* Paid sick time
* Parental leave
* Work from home

Work Location: In person

Expected Start Date: 05/10/2025

title: Student Internship Programme - Hang Seng Bank (HK)
description:
Job description
**Hang Seng Bank Student Internship Programme**

**Some careers have more impact than others.**


If you’re looking for a career where you can make a real impression, join Hang Seng and discover how valued you’ll be. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, Hang Seng offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.


We welcome all full\-time University students from different disciplines to join our Student Internship Programme. Our full\-time internship will equip you with valuable banking knowledge and skills to build an exciting career in the banking industry, putting you one step ahead of the rest. Perform well and you might be considered for early selection of Management Trainee Programme or other graduate opportunities.

  

We are currently seeking a high\-calibre individual to join our team for the following functions: \-

* **Audit**
* **Chief Operating Office**
	+ Chief Control Office / Operations
	+ Transformation Services / Performance Services
* **Commercial Banking**
	+ Business Banking / Corporate Banking \& Large Local Corporate
	+ Global Payment Solutions / Global Trade Solutions
* **Commercial Banking \- Strategic Change, Business Risk and Client Services**


	+ CMB Business Risk / Client Services and Chief Administration Office
	+ CMB Data and Analytics / Digital \& Transformation
* **Finance**
	+ Asset Liability and Capital Management / Strategic Planning and Stress Testing
	+ Financial Reporting / Investor Relations
* **Retail Banking \& Wealth**
	+ Business Risk \& Control / Strategies
	+ Digital Banking / Transformation
	+ Insurance / Actuarial
	+ Liabilities \& Secured Lending / Unsecured Lending (Cards, Loans, Deposits)
* **Risk and Compliance**
* **Strategy and Corporate Development**


For more information about our business functions, please visit here.

 **Programme Overview**


Duration: 6\-month full\-time internship


Employment Period: January 2026 \- June 2026

* Subject to availability, early onboarding can be considered
* For student visa holder, a valid student visa to cover the whole employment period is required

**Your Benefits**

* Business exposure – hands\-on experience on the bank’s day\-to\-day business and innovative projects
* Knowledge growth – access to the bank’s market insight and financial analysis
* On\-the\-job trainings – receive support and guidance from experienced professionals with constructive feedback
* Structured and comprehensive learnings – access to the bank’s learning hub containing interpersonal and technical skills resources
* Dynamic working environment – surrounded by experienced professionals to develop your essential competencies
* Networking and social opportunities – build professional connections through social events
* Potential career path – consider for early selection of Management Trainee Programme or other graduate opportunities if your performance is satisfactory


Requirements
**Requirements**


* Full\-time university students, or bachelor’s degree holder with deferred full\-time master’s degree offer. All academic disciplines are welcome
* Be innovative and creative to new ideas and approaches
* Have growth mindset to challenge the status quo and courage to explore new opportunities
* Ability to communicate with impact, influence and present confidently
* Demonstrate a team\-player spirit with strong integrity and work ethic
* Proficiency in English and Chinese
* Good knowledge of application software (MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint) \& Chinese Word Processing
* Permanent resident of Hong Kong or holding a valid Hong Kong student visa

We review applications on a rolling\-basis and the hiring process may take longer than usual due to high volume of applications. Your patience and understanding will be appreciated.

  



**You’ll achieve more when you join Hang Seng Bank Limited.**


**www.hangseng.com/careers**


**https://www.linkedin.com/company/hang\-seng\-bank/**


Hang Seng is committed to service excellence. Our people are our most important asset and play a vital role in our efforts to continually enhance our performance for customers and provide best\-in\-class products and services. We seek to attract high\-calibre talent by offering a dynamic working environment, good career development opportunities and competitive compensation packages.


Issued by Hang Seng Bank Limited

title: Global Outperformer Trainee - Logistics Track (2026 intake) - North Asia
description:
WHAT'S THE ROLE?


We’re looking for the next generation of high\-performing, multi\-lingual, post\-graduate talents to take our company forward. Hilti Outperformer Trainee Program is a global management development program like no other, with international projects, functional rotations and lots of exposure to senior management along the 2\-year journey. Upon program completion, participants are primed for managerial positions within our Hilti global network.


WHO IS HILTI?


***About Hilti***  

At Hilti, we are a passionate global team committed to making construction better. As a trusted partner for productivity, safety, and sustainability, we provide our customers innovative solutions that impact the buildings, roads, and infrastructure people rely on every day.  

  

  

Hilti is where individuals grow lasting careers by exploring possibilities, maximizing their potential, owning their development, and making a real difference every day. In 2024, we are thrilled to be recognized as the 5th World's Best Workplaces™ by Great Place to Work® Institute.
  

  

***About Hilti North Asia***  

We have 1,800\+ members in 5 Market Organizations in the North Asia region: Hong Kong, Mainland China, Taiwan, Japan, and South Korea, with Hong Kong being the regional hub as well in a separate office. There are also 2 production plants located in Mainland China (Zhanjiang \& Shanghai).  

  

Our unique caring and performance\-oriented culture has gained worldwide recognition \- in 2024, we are thrilled to be recognized as the 4th Best Workplaces™ in Asia by Great Place to Work® Institute!
WHAT DOES THE ROLE INVOLVE?


Our Hilti Outperformer \- Logistics Track is a 24\-month graduate program where you are involved in a range of rotations at local and international level. There are three primary work stages in the program:  

  

  



* 3 months of **Global Logistics Project** in the headquarter (Liechtenstein)
* 17 months of various **operational projects** in different locations, transferring your global experience to a regional level
* 4 months of **strategic project** in the regional headquarters

**"Hilti encourages all employees to take ownership, and I was given many opportunities to take the lead and make a real business impact."** ***—******Mandy Yau, Outperformer graduate (2021 intake), currently Global Logistics Process Manager at Finland***

WHAT DO WE OFFER?


You’ll get the support you need to learn, grow and carve out your career and, aside from an incredible experience, you’ll be given mentorship by a senior leader and take part in Global Outperformer Summits.  

  

  



* **Hilti Summit** \- 4 \- 5 days at our headquarters in Schaan (Liechtenstein) for a global view of our business
* **CSR Summit** \- 7 \- 8 days in a house building project to improve life conditions of those in need
* **Leadership Course \& Summit** – a course at a renowned European business school, as well as a 5\-day on\-site summit

WHAT YOU NEED IS:


* You hold a **master's degree** in supply chain management or other related fields, such as industrial management or operation management.
* You are a multilingual talent, **fluent in English and Cantonese/Mandarin/Japanese/Korean** .
* You have gained international experience through your work or studies and have spent between **3 months to 3 years in a professional environment** .
* You enjoy learning and are mature, assertive, curious and dedicated.
* You are a flexible team player, with good communication, social skills, and enthusiasm to inspire others.
* You are **internationally mobile\*** , a global thinker who appreciates diverse cultural experiences and the opportunity to work abroad.

*\*Applicants with location flexibility within North Asia (Hong Kong, Mainland China, Japan, and South Korea) will be considered for the Management Associate Program.*WHY SHOULD YOU APPLY?


We have an inclusive and passionate global team at Hilti. If you’ve never worked in construction industry, that’s not a problem. Success at Hilti is down to teamwork and ability, no matter what your background is.


What you can expect when applying to a position with Hilti:  

  

  

  

1\. We are committed to having all applications reviewed by a human and while nobody is infallible, we stand by our people centric approach to everything we do.
  

\*\* *Please note that the selection process will start no sooner than late 2025\.\*\**  

  

2\. Once you submit your application you can expect to receive automated notifications from our system (triggered by our recruiting team)
  

  

3\. Applications that do not make it to the interview stage (with a hiring manager) will not receive personalized feedback.
  

  

4\. Our end\-to\-end recruitment process (including evaluation time and interviews) may last between 3 and 6 weeks. You can expect to hear back from us within 2\-3 weeks (on average) regardless of outcome
  

  

5\. We wish you the best in your application process. Check out our career frequently asked questions ( https://careers.hilti.group/en/faqs/) for application and interview tips
  

  

*Hilti North Asia Global Outperformer Trainee Program Mini\-site:* *Hilti North Asia \- Global Outperformer Trainee Program \- Hilti (beamery.eu)*

**APPLY NOW**


**Share****Save**

* **CSR Summit** \- 7 \- 8 days in a house building project to improve life conditions of those in need
* **Leadership Course \& Summit** – a course at a renowned European business school, as well as a 5\-day on\-site summit

WHAT YOU NEED IS:


* You hold a **master's degree** (engineering, business administration or international management).
* You are a multilingual talent, **fluent in English and Cantonese/Mandarin/Japanese/Korean** .
* You have gained internat **ional experience through your work or studies and have spent between** 3 months to 3 years in a professional environment.
* You enjoy learning and are mature, assertive, curious and dedicated.
* You are a flexible team player, with good communication, social skills, and enthusiasm to inspire others.
* You are **internationally mobile** , a global thinker who appreciates diverse cultural experiences and the opportunity to work abroad.

WHY SHOULD YOU APPLY?


We have an inclusive and passionate global team at Hilti. If you’ve never worked in sales or construction, that’s not a problem. Success at Hilti is down to teamwork and ability, no matter what your background is.


**What you can expect when applying to a position with Hilti:**  

1\. We are committed to having all applications reviewed by a human and while nobody is infallible, we stand by our people centric approach to everything we do.
  

\*\* ***Please note that the selection process will start no sooner than late 2025\.\*\****  

  

2\. Once you submit your application you can expect to receive automated notifications from our system (triggered by our recruiting team)
  

  

3\. Applications that do not make it to the interview stage (with a hiring manager) will not receive personalized feedback.
  

  

4\. Our end\-to\-end recruitment process (including evaluation time and interviews) may last between 3 and 6 weeks. You can expect to hear back from us within 2\-3 weeks (on average) regardless of outcome
  

  

5\. We wish you the best in your application process. Check out our career frequently asked questions ( https://careers.hilti.group/en/faqs/) for application and interview tips

title: Aviation Operations Trainee Programme
description:
**The role** **Kickstart Your Aviation Career!**



We are looking for passionate and energetic individuals to join our structured **Aviation Operations Trainee Programme** at Hong Kong International Airport. This is an excellent opportunity for fresh graduates who aspire to build a career in airport operations, flight planning, load control, and ramp services.



\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*


**What You Will Learn:**


* Pre\-flight planning and accurate load sheet preparation for passenger and cargo flights
* Cargo and baggage distribution planning to ensure proper aircraft balance and weight
* Estimated Zero Fuel Weight (EZFW) calculation and communication with operations teams
* Coordination of flight close\-out, passenger handling, and special requirements
* In\-flight catering planning and meal order management
* Aircraft loading instructions, load supervision, and compliance with safety regulations
* Operational message handling (LDM, CPM, PTM, PSM, APIS)
* Collaboration with ramp teams, flight controllers, and government authorities
* Maintenance of flight records, reports, and operational supplies
* Adherence to aviation safety and airline compliance standards

\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*


**Training Roadmap:**



\>\> Passenger Flight Load Control (around 3 months)



\>\>\>\> Cargo Services Ramp Agent (around 2 months)



\>\>\>\>\>\> Cargo Flight Load Control (around 3 months)



Upon completion, you will be appointed as a **Cargo Services Load Controller**, with flexibility to support **passenger load control or ramp services** as needed.



\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*


**Why Join Us?**


* Full structured on\-the\-job training
* Career progression in the aviation industry
* Dynamic and supportive team environment
* Hands\-on experience in real airport operations

\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*



Ready to launch your aviation journey? Apply now and grow with us at one of the world’s busiest airports!

 **The Person**  

* Degree holder in Aviation, Logistics, Transport, or related disciplines
* Strong command of written and spoken English and Chinese
* Proficient in MS Office
* Energetic, eager to learn, and self\-motivated
* Able to work independently and under pressure
* Willing to work on rostered shifts, including weekends and public holidays
* No experience required – training will be provided!
  

  

Job Reference: JASL SDO00075

title: Product Specialist
description:
**Job Purpose:**  

  

The Trainee \- Account Management will primarily take care of smaller GSI accounts and will ensure The Management trainee will gain product knowledge and be under the supervision and support of the National Account Manager and/or the National Sales Manager, thereby positioning the Company as a brand in the market.  

  

**Responsibilities:**  

* Undergo trainings and certifications assigned department (10%)
* Supporting the Primary or National Account Manager for liaising with Key accounts (40%)
* Working on individual contribution through GSI smaller accounts (30%)
* Operational excellence \- pipeline management, forecasting \& inventory management. Execution \- Credit management, Order processing, AR Collections (20%)

  

**Knowledge, Skills and Experience:**  

* Bachelor's Degree with Graduate field of study required.
* Able to execute instructions and to request clarification when needed.
* Able to perform basic mathematical calculations.
* Able to recognize and attend to important details with accuracy and efficiency.
* Able to communicate clearly and convey necessary information.
* Able to converse and write effectively in English and Spanish.
* Able to create and conduct formal presentations.
* Able to negotiate skillfully, promote/sell ideas persuasively, and close transactions with mutually beneficial results.
* Possesses strong multi\-cultural interpersonal skills.
* Able to constructively work under stress and pressure when faced with high workloads and deadlines.
* Able to maintain and promote social, ethical, and organizational standards in conducting internal and external business activities.
* Able to maintain confidentiality of sensitive information.
* Able to build solid, effective working relationships with others.
* Able to exhibit ability to be sensitive to the needs, concerns, and feelings of others.
* Able to quickly learn new systems and technology.
* Able to use relevant computer system applications at a basic level.

  

**Working Conditions:**  

* Distribution center environment may include exposure to extreme temperatures; high noise levels; high places; wet and/or humid conditions; and outside weather conditions.
* Occasional non\-standard work hours or overtime as business requires.
* On\-call availability required as necessary.
* Professional, office environment.
* Some travel required.

  

**Key Skills**  

  

**What's In It For You?**  

* **Elective Benefits:** Our programs are tailored to your country to best accommodate your lifestyle.
* **Grow Your Career:** Accelerate your path to success (and keep up with the future) with formal programs on leadership and professional development, and many more on\-demand courses.
* **Elevate Your Personal Well\-Being:** Boost your financial, physical, and mental well\-being through seminars, events, and our global Life Empowerment Assistance Program.
* **Diversity, Equity \& Inclusion:** It's not just a phrase to us; valuing every voice is how we succeed. Join us in celebrating our global diversity through inclusive education, meaningful peer\-to\-peer conversations, and equitable growth and development opportunities.
* **Make the Most of our Global Organization**: Network with other new co\-workers within your first 30 days through our onboarding program.
* **Connect with Your Community:** Participate in internal, peer\-led inclusive communities and activities, including business resource groups, local volunteering events, and more environmental and social initiatives.

  

**Don't meet every single requirement? Apply anyway.**  

  

At Tech Data, a TD SYNNEX Company, we're proud to be recognized as a great place to work and a leader in the promotion and practice of diversity, equity and inclusion. If you're excited about working for our company and believe you're a good fit for this role, we encourage you to apply. You may be exactly the person we're looking for!  

  

We are an equal opportunity employer and committed to building a diverse team that represents and empowers a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment based on merit, without regard to race, colour, religion, national origin, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, genetics, age, or any other characteristic protected by law. To support our diversity and inclusion efforts, we may ask for voluntary gender disclosure information. This data will be used solely to improve our hiring practices and ensure fair treatment for all candidates.

title: Business Development Manager
description:
Zeal Group is an award\-winning FinTech organisation offering a variety of products. Founded in 2017, we have grown to a team of 700\+ employees across the globe


Headquartered in London, UK, our offices and presence are spread across Europe, Asia, North \& South Africa, Middle East and South America, with our Technology hub located in Cyprus


We are a product and people focused company who are passionate about growth, innovative technology, and collaboration

**What you will be doing:**

* Research for potential clients to build a database of leads.
* Provide impressive client onboarding journey and high\-quality service and product information to customers to satisfy their changing financial needs.
* Interact with customers through various channels such as phone call, emails, live chat to address to customer enquiries on timely and accurate manner.
* Explore business opportunities and strengthen customer relationships by sharing our product training.
* Present up\-to\-date markets insights to our prestigious clients.
* Analyse the financial needs of a diverse range of customers from mass\-market to high\-net\-worth segments, both locally and internationally.
* Perform in accordance with key performance metrics and contribute as a strong team player.

**Requirements**

**What do you need:**

* 1 to 3 years of experience in sales and/or business development for Forex/ Financial industry.
* Diploma/ High Diploma/ associate or bachelor’s Degree holder of business\-related discipline.
* Fluent in verbal \& written both English and Chinese, native Mandarin speaker or well understand China market will be an advantage.
* Passion in acquiring new business knowledge in fast\-paced environment.
* Self\-starter and fast learner
* Able to multi\-task, fast learner, good follow through, problem solving skill, good comprehension, customer relations and proactive mindset.
* Fresh graduate can be considered as Trainee.
* IANG visa holders are welcomed.

**Benefits**

* Group Medical Insurance Scheme
* Long Service Awards
* Optical Benefit
* Gym/Sports Benefit
* Long Service Rewards (Bonus Annual Leaves \+ Cash Incentives in USD)
* Discretionary Bonus (T\&C applies)

title: [Kai Tak Sports Park] Senior Officer - Human Resources (Casual Staffing)
description:
Kai Tak Sports Park is a fully integrated sports, leisure and entertainment destination that is expected to be completed in 2024\. The 28 hectare park will be part of the redevelopment on the site of the old Hong Kong International Airport in Kai Tak. Kai Tak Sports Park Ltd (KTSPL) has been awarded the contract to undertake this project. ASM Global, through its subsidiary company in Hong Kong, SMG China, has been engaged by KTSPL to be the Operator of Kai Tak Sports Park.
  
  

About ASM Global
  
  

ASM Global is the world’s leading producer of entertainment experiences. It is the global leader in venue and event strategy and management—delivering locally tailored solutions and cutting\-edge technologies to achieve maximum results for venue owners. The company’s elite venue network spans five continents, with a portfolio of more than 350 of the world’s most prestigious arenas, stadiums, performing arts venues, and convention and exhibition centers, including McCormick Place Chicago; Moscone Center San Francisco; ICC Sydney Australia; Olympia London; Shenzhen World China; and P\&J Live in Aberdeen, U.K. Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn and Twitter. asmglobal.com
  
  

**Department :** People \& Culture
  
  

**Reports to :** Manager \- Human Resources (Casual Staffing)
  
  

Role Introduction
  
  

Reporting to the Manager \- Human Resources, the Senior Officer Human Resources (Casual Staffing) plays a key role in supporting the recruitment, deployment, and management of a high volume of casual workers across various functions. This role combines operational HR responsibilities with a strong focus on data analytics, ensuring accurate and efficient handling of casual deployment, performance evaluation, payroll data verification, training coordination and complaint handling. The position is event\-driven and requires onsite support to ensure seamless execution of staffing operations at Kai Tak Sports Park.
  
  

Key Responsibilities
  
  

Act as a key point of contact for casual staff, addressing queries and concerns.
  
  

Analyse deployment data to optimize casual staffing schedules and resource allocation.
  
  

Monitor and report on performance ratings of casual staff, identifying trends and areas for improvement.
  
  

Conduct regular audits and checks on payroll data to ensure accuracy and compliance with contractual terms.
  
  

Develop and maintain Excel\-based dashboards and reports to track staffing metrics (e.g., utilization, costs, turnover, performance).
  
  

Analyse workforce data to identify trends, gaps, and opportunities for optimization.
  
  

Provide regular insights and recommendations to HR leadership and operational teams.
  
  

Support implementation and enhancement of HR systems related to casual staffing, streamline data flows and resolve discrepancies.
  
  

Coordinate logistics for training programs, including scheduling, venue setup, and participant registration.
  
  

Maintain accurate training records and ensure timely updates to staff profiles.
  
  

Support the development and distribution of training materials (e.g., handouts, presentations, e\-learning content).
  
  

Assist in delivering training sessions and onboarding programs for new casual staff, both in\-person and virtually, under the guidance of trainers.
  
  

Evaluate training effectiveness through feedback collection and data analysis, recommending improvements.
  
  

Monitor compliance with mandatory training and certifications.
  
  

Maintain training records and documentation, ensuring accuracy and completeness.
  
  

Manage timesheet submissions and approvals, ensuring timely processing.
  
  

Contribute to the development and refinement of the procedures related to casual staffing.
  
  

Provide onsite HR support during events, ensuring smooth execution of staffing plans.
  
  

Perform other duties as assigned by supervisor.
  
  

Requirements
  
  

Bachelors degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Data Analytics, or a related field.
  
  

Experience in HR operations with a focus on casual staffing, preferably in event, hospitality, or service industries.
  
  

Strong analytical skills with proficiency in Excel, Power BI, or other data visualization tools.
  
  

Advanced Excel skills (e.g., pivot tables, VLOOKUP, data visualization).
  
  

Familiarity with payroll systems and HRIS platforms.
  
  

Proficient in using training management systems, learning management systems (LMS), or similar tools.
  
  

Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively interact with trainers and trainees.
  
  

Strong organisational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to manage multiple tasks and deadlines.
  
  

Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast\-paced, dynamic environment with changing priorities and the willingness to adapt as needed.
  
  

Proficient in MS Office applications, including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook.
  
  

Willingness to work flexible hours, including evenings, weekends, and holidays as required.
  
  

Less experienced will be considered as Officer \- Human Resources (Casual Staffing).
  
  

Interested parties please send full resume with current salary, expected salary and availability by clicking “ Apply Now ”.
  
  

Personal \& Application Information
  
  

We are an equal opportunity employer. Data collected will be treated in strict confidence and used for recruitment purpose only. Applicants who are not invited for interviews within 4 weeks may consider their applications unsuccessful.
  
  

Full\-time,Permanent

title: VP, Branch Business Manager (Licensed), Consumer Banking Group
description:
Business FunctionAs the leading bank in Asia, DBS Consumer Banking Group is in a unique position to help our customers realise their dreams and ambitions. As a market leader in the consumer banking business, DBS has a full spectrum of products and services, including deposits, investments, insurance, mortgages, credit cards and personal loans, to help our customers realise their dreams and aspirations at every life stage. Our financial solutions are not only the best in the business ? they were made just right for you.Responsibilities(A) Sales Management and Business Development\* Lead \& drive sales performance on a team basis through needs\-based selling and service compliance to achieve Branch overall business objectives and sales targets.\* Conduct business planning to identify branch specific opportunities and introduce new sales initiatives to boost branch performance.\* Ensure CRM call activities in line with Relationship Management Model and weekly sales planning properly executed to achieve growth \& retention targets.\* Prioritize staff?s focus sales activities and conduct regular review meetings to maximize their sales capacity and effectiveness.\* Work with the CSM to ensure an effective referral program in place and targets are achieved by CS staff.\* Maintain business and social contacts for the purpose of managing \& developing business, improving penetration, \& expanding customer base.\* Perform RI regulated activities and TR insurance activities.\* Reflect customer feedback \& competitive situation and recommend suggestions to the District Head.(B) People Management and Development\* Effectively deploy resources at the branch to maximize productivity within and across team(s).\* Identify critical training needs of sales \& CS staff, coach and develop staff to meet the performance standards.\* Supervise staff?s day\-to\-day performance and maintain discipline.\* Communicate clearly \& promptly through regular briefings/meetings and give on\-going motivation, feedback, coaching \& on\-the\-job training to support staff development \& career advancement.\* Build trust \& morale among branch team and solve any staff issues fairly.\* Provide development \& support to trainees and new joiners assigned to the branch.
  
  

In particular, ensure the completion of in\-branch orientation program for new staff.\* Liaise with the District Head to attract, develop and retain high performing sales \& CS staff.(C) Customer Experience Management\* Lead all sales \& CS staff to provide the best customer experience in the branch, ensuring the Bank?s required service standards \& models are met and the pre\-set satisfaction level in various customer surveys/tracking programs are achieved.\* Work closely with the CSM to manage service quality \& efficiency of sales \& CS staff, customer perception during queuing, POS display and branch environment.\* Attend to customer needs promptly and resolve customers? complaints tactfully according to the Bank?s Complaint Handling and Escalation Procedures in a timely manner.(D) Audit and Compliance Control\* Supervise the operation and sales activities of staff to ensure full compliance with both external regulatory codes/ordinance \& internal compliance policies, standards, guidelines \& procedures, particularly those applicable to the course of selling, i.e. sales staff?s licensing and fitness \& properness, KYC, IPQ, FNA, PDPO, anti\-money laundering \& documentation completeness in a/c opening \& in each deal.\* Improve control and compliance quality for sales and branch operation through leadership, education, on\-going monitoring \& effective remedial actions.\* Comply with the registered capacity as well as any conditions imposed by the HKMA. This includes compliance with the applicable requirements of the Code of Conduct for Persons Licensed by or Registered with the SFC.
  
  

Requirements\* Degree holder,preferably in business or finance related discipline\* Minimum 3 years of sales experience in investment and insurance products\* Knowledge of home loans, unit trust, insurance, wealth management, etc. products of the Bank.\* Knowledge of financial planning and analysis, credit assessment and analysis.\* Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to collaborate across teams and stakeholders\* Good education background, preferably up to University Level.\* Must be registered RI \[ Regulated Activities: Type 1 \& 4] with passes in HKSI Licensing Examination Papers 1, 7 \& 8; or equivalent.\* Must be registered TR \[ General \& Long Term (incl. linked long term)] with passes in IIQE papers 1, 2, 3 \& 5; or equivalent.\* Preferably be registered CI ? CRWP (ECF\-RWM)\* CFP and CFA designation would be an advantage.\* Fluent in Mandarin and English are required\* The hiring process for this role is subject to the Mandatory Reference Checking Scheme.
  
  

Please see further details here. Apply NowWe offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.We regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified.\-en

title: Solution architect
description:
**Why SoftwareOne?** **oday SoftwareOne is a global leader in software and cloud portfolio management and is modernizing the way organizations budget and optimize their global IT spend from on\-premises to the cloud.**

  

SoftwareOne is a global cloud consulting partner that maintains the highest partner status across these hyperscalers, and we are looking for consultant trainee to join our team consulting team.* Microsoft Azure (Gold Partner \+ Azure Expert MSP)
* Amazon Web Service (Premier Services Partner)
* Google Cloud Platform (Premier Partner)


  

**The role**  

The Security Solution Architect will work in a team environment, providing technology consulting to our customers. This role involves offering technical counselling and support as part of the creation and delivery of technology solutions tailored to meet customers’ business needs, thereby gaining a deep understanding of their businesses.  

The Security Solution Architect will establish and maintain effective customer relationships to ensure satisfaction. This highly motivated individual will stay abreast of innovative technologies and possess extensive industry and market domain knowledge.  

Additionally, the Security Solution Architect will support account teams on complex projects and programs, delivering both business and technical solutions throughout the pre\-sales process. This includes planning, design, implementation, and support to ensure that IT solutions align with the overall business strategy and architecture. **The role:*** Technology and business enablement advocate to advise on standard methodologies for applying IT to drive competitive advantage.
* Provide guidance to customers, driving solution architecture, and ensuring solution strategy is effectively aligned with business strategy.
* Understand and implement a solution roadmap and select the right infrastructure and technology platform or product based on in\-depth knowledge of one and broad knowledge of other technologies and/or alliance product landscape.
* Chip in to the pre\-sales activities of the business development team and deliver accurate and risk aware input into the estimating and planning processes
* Production of high\-quality user documentation (high / low Level Design Documents)
* Encourage and facilitate the exchange of ideas within a community (e.g. team, practice, or project).
* Foster a culture of collaboration and encourage team members to share and reuse information across projects.


  

**What we need to see from you**  

* Proven track record in a Systems Integrator or within a large organisation (\>2000 users) implementing sophisticated IT solutions in hybrid environments
* 5\+ years of customer interaction in a consultant, technical delivery or technical leadership role.
* Project experience on security, AI, and data is an added advantage
* Advanced knowledge in one and good knowledge in at least two in the following technology areas
* Cloud security solutions (Public, Private, Hybrid)
* Sophisticated knowledge of M365 Security \& Compliance features and functions
* Information protection, international compliance requirements
* Identity management and advanced identity protection
* Baseline security of an hybrid M365 environment
* Desirable skills to have experience around the following:
* Enterprise Mobility \& Security (EM\+S)
* Microsoft Sentinel or another 3rd party SIEM / SOAR solution
* Double Key encryption / HSM / HYOK
* Multi\-tenant security management
* Ability to support solution implementation or application design deliverables.
* Ability to learn quickly and keep pace with the rapid changes in the IT industry particularly in cloud and mobility.
* Ability to understand and work with detailed project plans and work breakdown structures.
* Ability to understand Architecture Specification deliverables that map customer business requirements to solution / technologies.
* Solid problem\-solving skills are desirable.
* Good verbal and written communication skills as well as strong business insight.
* Good presentation skills as you will be required to interact with customers and local specialists.

 **Desirable Technical Skills \& Certifications**
Any combination of the following certifications

* Microsoft Azure Administrator Associate
* Microsoft Azure Solutions Architect Expert
* Microsoft Certified Azure Security Engineer Associate
* Microsoft Cybersecurity Architect Expert
* Microsoft Identity and Access Administrator Associate
* Microsoft Certified Security Operations Analyst
* CISSP
* CEH
* Any other security software / hardware certifications


  

**Job Function**  

  

Sales

title: General Insurance Executive / Executive Trainee
company: Sun Mobility Insurance and Claims Services Limited
description:
Sun Mobility Insurance and Claims Services Limited is a leading professional multi\-modal transport risk management and insurance broker in Hong Kong. For more information, please visit our website www.sun\-mobility.com / www.linkedin.com/company/sun\-mobility\-insurance\-and\-claims\-services\-limited/.
  
  

The firm is a member company of the Sun Hing Group (www.sunhinggroup.com).
  
  

Why Join Us?
  
  

Hong Kong’s general insurance sector is thriving with expanding opportunities. Here is an insight from Insurance Business:
  
  

The general insurance market posted gross premiums of HK$100\.5 billion and net premiums of HK$69\.7 billion. Total gross claims paid amounted to HK$53 billion, while overall operating profit stood at HK$8\.1 billion, including HK$3\.3 billion in underwriting profits.
  
  

Direct general insurance business recorded HK$51\.4 billion in gross premiums and HK$35\.8 billion in net premiums. Major classes included:
  
  

accident and health (HK$22\.8 billion)
  
  

general liability (including employees’ compensation) at HK$12\.1 billion
  
  

property damage at HK$6\.2 billion
  
  

motor vehicle at HK$5\.4 billion
  
  

Profit contributions from general liability and property damage were partially offset by losses in pecuniary loss and accident and health lines.
  
  

Reinsurance inward business accounted for HK$49 billion in gross premiums and HK$33\.9 billion in net premiums, with gross claims of HK$25 billion. A total underwriting profit of HK$2\.1 billion was mainly attributed to property damage coverage.
  
  

Sun Mobility Insurance and Claims Services Limited is a leading professional multi\-modal transport risk management and insurance broker in Hong Kong. For more information, please visit our website www.sun\-mobility.com / www.linkedin.com/company/sun\-mobility\-insurance\-and\-claims\-services\-limited/.
  
  

The firm is a member company of the Sun Hing Group (www.sunhinggroup.com).
  
  

We are seeking a motivated General Insurance Executive / Executive Trainee to help clients navigate this dynamic market while building expertise in underwriting, claims, and risk solutions. This is your chance to build a rewarding career in a dynamic and profitable sector.
  
  

What We Offer
  
  

Competitive salary
  
  

Group medical and life insurance
  
  

Discretionary year\-end bonus
  
  

5 work days per week
  
  

1\.5 hours lunch break
  
  

What You’ll Do
  
  

Business acquisition, customer maintenance and relationship management.
  
  

Independent account handling such as to answer enquiries, obtain and issue quotation, confirm order placement, issue debit notes and compilation of replies/returns reports and to maintain database. The incumbent is also expected to handle claims.
  
  

Insurers relationship management.
  
  

What We’re Looking For
  
  

Tertiary education with IIQE Papers I \& II
  
  

Responsible, organized, and able to work independently.
  
  

Experience in general insurance (special risks experience is a plus)
  
  

Customer\-oriented and team player with excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
  
  

Good command of spoken English and written English and Chinese.
  
  

Position offered would depend on the candidate's relevant experience. We offer an attractive salary and employee benefits. Please apply with a full resume and expected salary to Carol Lam.
  
  

**Tel. no. :** 2299 5528
  
  

**Address :** 23/F, Excel Centre, 483A Castle Peak Road, Lai Chi Kok, Kowloon, Hong Kong
  
  

**Website :** www.sun\-mobility.com
  
  

www.linkedin.com/company/sun\-mobility\-insurance\-and\-claims\-services\-limited/

title: Merchandiser - Textile
description:
About ALDI
  
  

Founded in 1913 in Germany, ALDI is one of the most reputable discount supermarket chains worldwide, we are operating more than 7,000 stores serving millions of customers across Europe, UK, Australia, USA and China. The ALDI name is synonymous with high quality and exceptional value. We deliver our customers quality products at the best available price.
  
  

At ADLI, the customer counts. So do our colleagues.
  
  

ALDI's values are those of Simplicity, a focus on Quality and Fairness.
  
  

ALDI Hong Kong
  
  

Our Hong Kong office is part of ALDI's international buying department where Direct Sourcing, Buying, Supply Chain Management and Sustainability are the core focus of the business.
  
  

We invite now high caliber talent to apply for Merchandiser to join our rapidly growing sourcing team in Hong Kong. This position supports product development and commercialization with a fast\-paced successful team.
  
  

Responsibilities.
  
  

Perform general sourcing duties as required by the Manager
  
Prepare and ensures that all documents related to tender, submission, awarding of contracts and shipments are correct and completed
  
Finalize submission comparison documents and identify preferred submission in line with company procedures
  
Effectively communicate with Quality, CR, Admin and Logistics team members as well as ALDI International departments/ offices and other internal/external parties on behalf of Manager/ team
  
Follow through the production process for all purchased products
  
Carry out visits to trade fairs or suppliers in order to manage and develop the supplier pool within the commodity area
  
Provides cover for the team members and supports the training of employees and trainees from other areas
  
  

Your Profile.
  
  

At least (Non\-Degree) Tertiary education required.
  
Minimum of 2 years' relevant working experience, preferably gained in sourcing/buying offices, working with consumer products.
  
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, team player.
  
Good command of both verbal and written business English and fluency in Mandarin essential.
  
Able to work independently, self\-motivated, responsible, well\-organized and willing to learn.
  
Attention to detail and good organizing, coordination and planning skills.
  
General knowledge of MS office and Exchange essential.
  
High level of maturity, integrity, trustworthiness.
  
  

Key Benefits of working at ALDI.
  
  

Market leading remuneration package
  
  

Above the market, rewarding, attractive remuneration package with guaranteed 13\-month\-salary.
  
Comprehensive group medical insurance covering dental and maternity (subject to eligibility) benefits.
  
Group Life insurance and group travel insurance coverage.
  
  

Work\-life balance and Flexibility
  
  

Full time, permanent position, 5\-day workweek with flexible working hours.
  
Work from home arrangement of up to 2 working days per week.
  
20 days of paid Annual Leave.
  
Fully paid parental leaves including 14\-week maternity leave and 5\-day paternity leave.
  
You also enjoy other special leaves such as birthday leave and marriage leave.
  
  

Being part of a pleasant, successful, growing business
  
  

ALDI’s business is expanding, same for the Hong Kong Office with lots of opportunities for growth and development.
  
Pleasant working atmosphere where proactive communication, teamwork and collaboration is highly valued.
  
ALDI Hong Kong dedicates our efforts into delivering high quality products to ALDI customers worldwide from the heart of Asia.
  
  

People Focused
  
  

Structured, comprehensive orientation and on\-the\-job training \- covering technical and competency training.
  
ALDI empowers our people allowing staff ownership of their areas of responsibilities.
  
We care for the wellness of our employees and offer initiatives such as corporate discount programs, employee assistance program, and ergonomic office furniture.
  
Comprehensive training \& development programs for our people, with clear career progression path, and training resources supported by ALDI HK Academy \[link removed].
  
  

Trust and Integrity
  
  

WE DO WHAT WE SAY \- for us there is no grey area, we have robust business processes, procedures and strong governance in place.
  
We embrace Diversity and Inclusion at ALDI, all our staff of different background are treated fairly.
  
We treat our staff members, customers, suppliers and service providers with trust and fairness as business partners.
  
  

How to apply
  
  

If you are interested in applying for the job, we look forward to receiving your full application in English, including salary expectation and possible starting date. The application should be sent through CTgoodjobs by clicking icon “Apply Now” or addressed to ALDI HR Department, 18/F, Millennium City 6, 392 Kwun Tong Road, Kwun Tong, Kowloon, Hong Kong.
  
  

ALDI is an Equal Opportunity employer. We are dedicated to create an equal opportunity throughout recruitment process and staff employment to build a diverse and inclusive workforce. We oppose all forms of unfair or unlawful discrimination in our selection process.
  
  

All personal data collected will be used for recruitment purposes only and be treated in strictest confidence and highest security level in accordance with Hong Kong Data (Privacy) Ordinance as well as ALDI internal Security Policy.
  
  

No part of this job content including but not limited to company information, logo and job description may be reproduced, presented, uploaded, transmitted, modified or distributed in any form or by any means without prior permission of ALDI Services Asia Limited / ALDI Sourcing Asia Limited (“the Company”). The Company reserves the right to take legal action on any unauthorized reproduction, presentation, upload, transmission, modification or distribution. Only applications submitted directly to the Company in response to this advertisement will be considered and any application received by the Company through unauthorized third party agents or via any other channels will not be considered.
  
  

Full\-time,Permanent

title: Assistant Guest Relations Manager [Ref No.: 2609]
company: The Hong Kong Jockey Club 香港賽馬會
description:
**Job Summary**

The job holder is responsible for the welcoming and well\-being of our Members. The job holder will possess attention to detail qualities, has a passion for ensuring our Members receive the best experience possible, and will possess a very personable character.

**The Job**

* Ensure operation excellence of the floor by: Maintaining effective communication to ensure that all related parties are informed of any relevant issues/queries/VIP guest requests that have arisen. Taking a proactive approach to guest relations activities, anticipating potential opportunities. Following proper work ethics, etiquette, and grooming to ensure their compliance with the Club's standard. Ensuring the maintenance of relevant equipment, furniture and fixtures, resources and assets, initiating requisitions via supervisor as required, and ensure general reception area is ready for service and in a tidy condition. Maintaining and renewing guest profiles on a regular basis. Mastering MCRM and related systems. Administering booking system, and ensuring smooth communication with all the department
* Handle all guest interactions and bookings in accordance with compliance / SOP requirements and service standards.
* Perform the "ambassador" role in accordance with the protocol regarding Member and guest handling for allergen related situations, as defined in SOP.
* Promote facilities and services to Members, collecting relevant comments to pass to their related teams for follow\-up and future planning.
* Collaborate with teams for monitoring service delivery.
* Perform any other related duties as and when assigned by supervisor.
* Assist in the preparation of operation reports as needed.
* Coach new staff and trainees to maintain established service standards, to achieve continuous improvement and to help colleagues align with the Club's culture.

**About You**

You should have

* Min. 3 years' relevant experience in hotel or sizable catering establishment with two years in similar position
* Preferably with Diploma in Hotel Management or equivalent

**Terms of employment**  
The level of appointment will be commensurate with qualifications and experience.

**How to Apply**

Please send your resume, complete with expected salary and job reference by clicking the **Apply Now** button or to:

Fax: 2966\-5770

Mail: The Human Resources Department, The Hong Kong Jockey Club, 1 Sports Road, Happy Valley, Hong Kong

We are an equal opportunity employer. Personal data provided by job applicants will be used strictly in accordance with the Club's notice to employees and prospective employees relating to the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance. A copy of which will be provided immediately upon requested.

Job Types: Full\-time, Permanent

Pay: $28,000\.00 \- $32,000\.00 per month

Work Location: In person

title: AI Trainee Programme | AI Engineering | HKD 18K - HKD 26K / mth
description:
We are excited to invite applications for our AI Trainee Programme with a leading financial institution that is establishing its Artificial Intelligence Center of Excellence (CoE). We are looking for 3\-5 motivated individuals eager to enter the AI industry.
  
Key Responsibilities
  
  

**Participate in training sessions focused on:**  

Designing and implementing AI models and algorithms
  
  

Developing and deploying machine learning applications
  
  

Utilizing cloud platforms (Kubernetes) for scalable AI solutions
  
  

Working with containerization tools like Docker for application management
  
  

Collaborating on coding projects that involve Vibe Coding and best practices in AI development
  
  

Engage in hands\-on projects to apply theoretical knowledge to practical scenarios.
  
  

Collaborate with mentors and peers to troubleshoot and optimize AI systems.
  
  

Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in artificial intelligence and machine learning.
  
  

**Required Experience:**  

**Education :**  

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics, or a related field.
  
  

Completion of a coding bootcamp or relevant coursework in AI and machine learning is preferred.
  
  

**Experience :**  

0\-2 years of experience in AI, machine learning, or related fields.
  
  

Internships or academic projects in AI development are a plus.
  
  

**Technical Skills :**  

Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Java.
  
  

Familiarity with machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit\-learn).
  
  

Understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software development principles.
  
  

**Knowledge :**  

Basic understanding of AI concepts, including supervised and unsupervised learning, natural language processing, and computer vision.
  
  

Exposure to cloud technologies, particularly Kubernetes and Docker.
  
  

Candidates with Banking / Financial services experiences is preferred.
  
  

**Soft Skills :**  

Strong analytical and problem\-solving abilities.
  
  

Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.
  
  

Team player with a proactive attitude and eagerness to learn.
  
  

**Interest :**  

A genuine passion for artificial intelligence and technology advancements.
  
We will provide a 17 weeks, 1 lesson each on Saturday 7pm \- 10pm. Upon completion of the programme with satisfactory result, you will be offered an AI engineer position in a leading financial institution for an employment of 2 years.
  
  

All applications applied through our system will be delivered directly to the advertiser and privacy of personal data of the applicant will be ensured with security.

title: Claim Service Manager - Hang Seng Insurance - Hang Seng Bank (HK)
description:
**Job description****Some careers have more impact than others.**


If you’re looking for a career where you can make a real impression, join Hang Seng and discover how valued you’ll be. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, Hang Seng offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.

**Insurance**


Hang Seng Bank was one of Hong Kong's bancassurance pioneers with insurance business footprint started since 1965\. Over the years, Hang Seng Bank has been committed to serve its customers by providing full spectrum of insurance products including Life Insurance manufacturing, distribution of General Insurance and Medical products, and MPF business.


Insurance is a fast\-growing business and is one of the key drivers of Hang Seng Bank. As a well\-established insurance entity, we take care of every need of our customers with an optimized service excellence through the Bank’s retail and commercial network, with a dedicated team of professionals in place.

**Principal responsibilities**

* Responsible for the day\-to\-day claim’s operation duties including but not limited to performing end to end claims assessment on Major \& Minor claims and approve the claim within the delegation of authority; produce claims related management report for management’s oversight
* Ensure claims process and claims decisions adhered to company’s guidelines and SLA
* Provide mentoring and coaching to junior assessors or trainees to enhance professional knowledge and quality of work
* Review cases escalated from junior assessors or trainees to uplift their authorities
* Perform quality assurance check against the claim cases conducted by other claim team members, governance \& audits
* Handle internal \& external enquiries and complaint cases
* Identify the areas of improvement in daily operations and provide input and change requirements to drive for streamlining and automation opportunities
* Provide SME support on product development and/or ad\-hoc claims related projects

  

**Requirements*** Minimum 10 years of claims experience
* Experience in handling major \& minor claims with authority
* Good in written and spoken English and Chinese
* Strong self\-motivation and ability to work under pressure
* Good communication and negotiation skills, with a thorough understanding of company products and analytical mind
* Independent and strong job commitment
* Great sense of ownership and servicing mindset to ensure efficient and effective customer service processes

 **You’ll achieve more when you join Hang Seng Bank Limited.**

**www.hangseng.com/careers**

**https://www.linkedin.com/company/hang\-seng\-bank/**


Hang Seng is committed to service excellence. Our people are our most important asset and play a vital role in our efforts to continually enhance our performance for customers and provide best\-in\-class products and services. We seek to attract high\-calibre talent by offering a dynamic working environment, good career development opportunities and competitive compensation packages.


Issued by Hang Seng Bank Limited
